metadata.name: Allosaurus Reconstruction
metadata.description:
“Allosaurus fragilis” or “Different Lizard”
Late Jurassic Epoch (145-155 million years ago)
~28 ft. in length weighing in at an estimated 2.3 metric tons
Main diet consisted of ornithopods, stegosaurus, & sauropods

This digital 4K illustration is my artistic reconstruction of a young Allosaurus based upon the skull specimen featured in this collection. The skeleton that inspired this work was found near Ten Sleep, Wyoming in the Dana Quarry. The owner of this NFT will also receive a metal print upon request.
